name: everyday train
description:
Who are we when no one is watching? A ride on the train awakens the people watcher in you and makes you appreciate the little details.

Play as our protagonist who takes a train ride every day and get introduced to interesting characters, peculiar posters, and tiny conversations.

Game by Evgeniya Kuznetsova; Janet K Howe; Oleg Egorov; Hanine El Mir.
